body:
You want to know the **World Golf Rankings** after each week of the PGA Tour? Bet Refinery has got your back. However, we're not giving you the official ones. You can go **[here](http://www.owgr.com/ranking)** for the square version. We're giving you the **betting version** of the World Golf Rankings. - - - ## **Bet Refinery World Golf Rankings** There's a new world number one according to our model. **Xander Schauffele**. We've been spruiking for probably two months now. He's had a second (really first in the Tour Championship), a second, third, fifth, sixth, 10th. All post Covid. Unbelievable. Edging out the incredible form of **Jon Rahm** in number two. And **Justin Thomas** is returning to his best at third spot in our World Golf Rankings. **DJ and Rory** round out the top five. Keep an eye on our boys **Patrick Cantlay** and **Adam Scott**. Always under valued by the market. Check out the top 50 world golf rankings (according to our Model) below:
- - - ## **Golf Picks** Keep an eye out for our weekly predictions and don't forget our **[Expert Betting Guide](https://www.betrefinery.com/golf-betting/how-to-bet-on-golf)**.
title: World Golf Rankings (For Sports Bettors)
seoTitle: World Golf Rankings (For Sports Bettors) | Top Golfers
description: Live World Golf Rankings, updated every week. Xander, Rahm, JT, DJ, Rory, who is on top now? Get the updated World Golf Rankings every week.
